function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation in the corridor","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to limited airflow and ventilation in the corridor","Mitigation":"Install ventilation systems or air purifiers to improve airflow and reduce the risk of disease transmission","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air purifiers","People":"Occupants of the building, healthcare staff, visitors","Owner":"Building management, healthcare facility management"},{"Description":"Negative pressure in the ward","Impact":"Potential for contaminated air to be drawn into the isolation rooms, increasing the risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Adjust the airflow pattern to ensure proper air circulation and pressure differentials in the ward","Technologies":"Airflow sensors, pressure differentials monitors","People":"Occupants of the building, healthcare staff, visitors","Owner":"Building management, healthcare facility management"},{"Description":"Inadequate cleaning and disinfection schedule","Impact":"Increased risk of surface contamination and disease transmission due to infrequent cleaning and disinfection","Mitigation":"Implement a more frequent and comprehensive cleaning schedule, provide proper training for cleaners on effective disinfection methods","Technologies":"Cleaning and disinfection equipment, training programs","People":"Occupants of the building, healthcare staff, visitors","Owner":"Building management, healthcare facility management"}]}
